main.name: Porsche Herskorn
main.description: UC Berkeley Extension Student and Aspiring Full-Stack Web Developer
main.bio: Hello, my name is Porsche Carrera Herskorn. I was born in Wisconsin and lived in Florida as a child before moving to California. Photography is a passion of mine and nature is my favorite subject to photograph. My current industry is dentistry, where I am a Registered Dental Assistant. After ten years in my field, I am excited to expand my knowledge and begin a new career path in webpage developement, and am currently seeking a full-time position as a junior developer.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me for further details.

education.degree: Diploma in Full Stack Web Development
education.description: A 24-week intensive program focused on gaining technical programming skills in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, JQuery, Bootstrap, Node.js, MySQL, MongoDB, Express.js, Handelbars.js, & ReactJS.

work.title: Registered Dental Assistant
work.description: Support a team of three dentists by preparing operation sites, assisting with surgical procedures, and maintaining instrument sterilization.

projects.title: Coming Soon
projects.category: Coming Soon is a single-page application built using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) that empowers users to create and manage data effortlessly.

projects.title: Parks Planner
projects.category: A server-side API driven web app to provide users with a list of national parks of a selected state and trails in the the selected area. (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, API)

projects.title: Personal Portfolio v1
projects.category: A simple portfolio website. (html, css, github pages)

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.category: View the 5-day forecast of a selected city via dynamically updated HTML and CSS. (HTML, CSS, JavScript, Bootstrap, API)

projects.title: Identifying Hex Codes with Regex
projects.category: A comprehensive guide to regular expressions for identifying hex codes, deployed via GitHub's Gist.

projects.title: Dev Gab
projects.category: A content-management-style (CMS) blog site where developers in the tech industry can post articles in areas relating to the tech industry. (HTML, CSS, HandleBars.js, MySQL2)

testimonials.text: Porsche knew exactly what we wanted! Our website looks amazing and the turn around time was really quick.
Thanks to Porsche, most of our customers visit our store via Social Media.
